data.title: Vitalik Buterin: Ethereum’s Growth Will Be “Less Uniform” as Gas Costs Face Targeted Adjustments
data.description: Just a year after developers—led in part by Vitalik Buterin’s push for scaling—began advocating for higher gas limits, Ethereum is now operating with a 60 million block gas limit, doubling network capacity in only 12 months. Expect continued growth but more targeted / less uniform growth for next year.eg. one ...
